articles.title: The Crown Season 6 Trailer, Release Date, Cast - Vulture
articles.description: The Crown season 6 is getting split into two parts. Part 1 drops November 16. The trailer said toodeloo to Claire Foy, Olivia Colman, and Imelda Staunton as Liz 2.0. This final season pushes the royal fam into the (Prince) Willennium.
